nexus_of_possibility.name: Nexus of Possibility
nexus_of_possibility.description: Hello and welcome to Limbo. There's nothing here... are you gonna fix that?

northern_shimmers.name: Northern Shimmers
northern_shimmers.description: A snowy expanse where cold mists of creation dance frigidly in the air.

southern_inspiration.name: Southern Inspiration
southern_inspiration.description: A desert of baking sands where mirages of what can be dot the horizon.

eastern_intuition.name: Eastern Intuition
eastern_intuition.description: A forest of the mind that goes on forever. Nature is the ultimate creator.

western_depths.name: Western Depths
western_depths.description: The sea of chaos births everything at the foam-covered shores.
